sentence.Network_en: To save ourselves from imaginary, or at any rate problematical, evils, we often incur real suffering.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了挽救想象之中 、 或者无论如何只是构成问题的不幸, 我们常常惹来真正的痛苦.

sentence.Network_en: He also has a dark and problematical double, the weird, intelligent boy next door.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还有一个内心阴暗、行为常的难兄难弟隔壁性格怪僻但天资聪颖的男孩.

sentence.Network_en: As a result, rape statistics have a reputation of being unreliable, and international comparisons are problematical.
sentence.Network_cn: 其结果是, 强奸案统计数据被人认为是不可靠的, 而且国际间的数据比较也有疑问.

entry.def: Problematical means the same as problematic .

sentences.sentence: "If you ever get married, which seems to be extremely problematic"

means.word_mean: 2. making great mental demands; hard to comprehend or solve;

sentences.sentence: "I faced the knotty problem of what to have for breakfast"
